Data Fields

uint16_t commandNo
 The command ID number 0x1801. More...
 
uint16_t status
 An integer telling the status of the command. This value is updated by the radio CPU during operation and may be read by the system CPU at any time. More...

 Pointer to the next operation to run after this operation is done. More...

 0: No alternative trigger command
1: CMD_TRIGGER can be used as an alternative trigger More...
 
   uint8_t   triggerNo:2
 The trigger number of the CMD_TRIGGER command that triggers this action. More...
 
   uint8_t   pastTrig:1
 0: A trigger in the past is never triggered, or for start of commands, give an error
1: A trigger in the past is triggered as soon as possible More...
 
} startTrigger
 Identification of the trigger that starts the operation. More...

   uint8_t   rule:4
 Condition for running next command: Rule for how to proceed. More...

 Number of skips + 1 if the rule involves skipping. 0: same, 1: next, 2: skip next, ... More...
 
} condition
 
uint8_t channel
 Channel to use
0–39: BLE advertising/data channel number
60–207: Custom frequency; (2300 + channel) MHz
255: Use existing frequency
Others: Reserved More...
 
struct {
   uint8_t   init:7
 If bOverride = 1 or custom frequency is used:
0: Do not use whitening
Other value: Initialization for 7-bit LFSR whitener. More...

 0: Use default whitening for BLE advertising/data channels

} whitening

Detailed Description

BLE Slave Command.

Definition at line 132 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::bEnaCmd

0: No alternative trigger command
1: CMD_TRIGGER can be used as an alternative trigger

Definition at line 141 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::bOverride

0: Use default whitening for BLE advertising/data channels
1: Override whitening initialization with value of init

Definition at line 160 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::channel

Channel to use
0–39: BLE advertising/data channel number
60–207: Custom frequency; (2300 + channel) MHz
255: Use existing frequency
Others: Reserved

Definition at line 151 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

uint16_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::commandNo

The command ID number 0x1801.

Definition at line 133 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

struct { ... } rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::condition
uint8_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::init

If bOverride = 1 or custom frequency is used:
0: Do not use whitening
Other value: Initialization for 7-bit LFSR whitener.

Definition at line 157 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::nSkip

Number of skips + 1 if the rule involves skipping. 0: same, 1: next, 2: skip next, ...

Definition at line 149 of file rf_ble_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_BLE_SLAVE_s::pastTrig

0: A trigger in the past is never triggered, or for start of commands, give an error
1: A trigger in the past is triggered as soon as possible
